text: Then Ishmael carried away captive all the rest of the people who  were  in Mizpah, the kingâ€™s daughters and all the people who remained in Mizpah, whom Nebuzaradan the captain of the guard had committed to Gedaliah the son of Ahikam. And Ishmael the son of Nethaniah carried them away captive and departed to go over to the Ammonites.
